Analyze the following text: Method for removing a plug 61 of crop material stuck in a feeder duct 23 of a baler 1 said baler comprisinga bale chamber 9 having an inlet opening 19 formed thereina feeder duct 23 communicating with the bale chamber 9 through the inlet opening 19 for charges of crop material 53 to be transferred from the feeder duct into the bale chamber wherein the feeder duct 23 has an upper end 27 facing generally upwardly and communicating with the inlet opening 19 in the bale chamber and a lower end 27 facing generally in a forward directiona plunger 7 reciprocally movable within the bale chamber 9 to compress successive charges of crop material 53 received from the feeder duct 23 to form a balefeeder means 25 operable within the feeder duct to accumulate a charge of crop material therein and then stuff that accumulated charge into the bale chamber 9 andcrop holding fingers 55 provided at the upper end 27 of the feeder duct 23 that are movable between a crop holding position and a withdrawn position wherein in the crop holding position the crop holding fingers 55 extend in the feeder duct 23 in the upper end part thereof to hold back the crop material 53 while the charge of crop material is being accumulated and in the withdrawn position the crop holding fingers 55 are withdrawn from the upper end part of the feeder duct to allow the accumulated charge of crop material to be stuffed into the bale chamber wherein the method comprisesin case of a plug 61 of crop material being stuck in the feeder duct 23 with the crop holding fingers 55 in their crop holding position moving the crop holding fingers 55 in their withdrawn position and causing the feeder means 25 to operate in the feeder duct 23 with the crop holding fingers 55 in their withdrawn position anddetecting the occurrence of a plugging of the feeder duct 23 and after detecting the occurrence of a plugging of the feeder duct 23 in case the crop holding fingers 55 are in their crop holding position moving the crop holding fingers 55 in their withdrawn position and causing the feeder means 25 to operate in the feeder duct with the crop holding fingers in their withdrawn position characterized in that the method further comprises for detecting the occurrence of a plugging of the feeder duct measuring the load on the feeder means 25 during operation thereof in the feeder duct 23 and comparing the measured load with a predetermined load that is indicative of a stuck plug 61 of crop material in the feeder duct.
